item.description: Your dreams are real. They can help you gain insights from the past and future, grow in confidence, heal yourself spiritually, and make decisions about your career and finances. In this discussion, let's talk about how dreams have helped us, and what we have learned from them. Brief examples are welcome. We'll also share techniques for learning to master your dream state!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be upstairs in the king's daughter's room
item.why: Dreams provide a fascinating glimpse into our inner worlds and outer life.

group.name: The Central Connecticut Spiritual Experiences Group

item.name: Dreams - A Source of Inner Truth
